title: Improving Social Security Disability Insurance with a Flat Benefit (The Heritage Foundation)
text: ( Source : The Heritage Foundation ) Abstract Social Security Disability Insurance ( SSDI ) became law in 1956 . Since then, it has morphed from a relatively small-scale, anti-poverty program into a massive system that provides benefits to one
